_header: That I tell hard I-maked that is alms deed
Title(s): mercy, works of; ages of man’s life; advice, moral
_description: On the Works of Mercy, Old Age, Doing good in this life, etc. — three monoriming quatrains

BLAdd43406.First Lines: þat ic telle hard y maket þat is almesdedevor ȝyue þe hungrye mete and þe nakede wede…
BLAdd43406.Last Lines: …þarfore ech man scolde þe wyles þat he myȝteþe godes þat god hem hauet ysend fayre dele & dyȝte
BLAdd43406.Editions:
Schofield,   B. 
             Muchelney Memoranda, edited from A Breviary of the Abbey in the
                Possession of J. Meade Falkner.
Somerset Record Society
         42 (1927): vii-xxvii, 1-198: 99.
